description:
`bigip_ltm_pool` Manages F5 BIG-IP LTM pools via iControl REST API.

Resources should be named with their "full path". The full path is the combination of the partition + name (example: /Common/my-pool ) or  partition + directory + name of the resource  (example: /Common/test/my-pool )

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

AllowNat.description: Specifies whether NATs are automatically enabled or disabled for any connections using this pool, [ Default : `yes`, Possible Values `yes` or `no`].

AllowSnat.description: Specifies whether SNATs are automatically enabled or disabled for any connections using this pool,[ Default : `yes`, Possible Values `yes` or `no`].

Description.description: Specifies descriptive text that identifies the pool.

LoadBalancingMode.description: Specifies the load balancing method. The default is Round Robin.

MinimumActiveMembers.description: Specifies whether the system load balances traffic according to the priority number assigned to the pool member,Default Value is `0` meaning `disabled`.

Monitors.description: List of monitor names to associate with the pool.

Name.description: Name of the pool,it should be "full path".The full path is the combination of the partition + name of the pool.(For example `/Common/my-pool`).

ReselectTries.description: Specifies the number of times the system tries to contact a new pool member after a passive failure.

ServiceDownAction.description: Specifies how the system should respond when the target pool member becomes unavailable. The default is `None`, Possible values: `[none, reset, reselect, drop]`.

SlowRampTime.description: Specifies the duration during which the system sends less traffic to a newly-enabled pool member.
